item.description: THIS MEETING IS CANCELED DUE TO THE EXPECTED SNOW STORM!!! We will skip one meeting since it would fall on Thanksgiving Thursday. We will continue on December 13th instead with Spinoza's Theological-Political Treatise. We plan to spend 3 meetings on this text, so we plan to cover the first 6 chapters (it has 20 chapters) on this first meeting. We also settled the plan so after the Theological-Political Treatise we will continue with John Locke. We will have one meeting on Plato's Meno as preparation then we will go onto Locke: An Essay Concerning Human Understanding.
item.name: CANCELED! Spinoza: Theological-Political Treatise I
